As Gaara traps his opponent within an enormous sphere of sand, he also manoeuvres his siblings around it in sand platforms. Kankurō uses the [[Sasori (puppet)|Sasori]] puppet to set the sphere on [[Flamethrower|fire]], while Temari [[Giant Folding Fan|fans]] the flames. Gaara finishes covering the opponent in sand, and crushes them, causing the flaming sand prison to explode.
